short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that replaces the Builder font on the Roblox Website, DevForum and Creator Dashboard!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you disturbed when you go to the Roblox website and you don't like the font that Roblox recently changed? Using this extension, you can change the font of the Roblox website back from Builder back to the old font!

Permissions needed (by display):
[Read or change your data on all roblox.com sites]: This is used to allow the extension to insert the old or selected font into your Roblox tabs!

Extension Features (optional):
[Use Remote Stylesheets]: Use the needed stylesheets using an internet connection instead of pre-installed sheets.
[Set Custom Resources URL]: Use an accessible remote font folder for the Roblox website, DevForum and Creator Dashboard instead of the old font! (Please make sure the source you enter is trusted and valid before using! If you want to make your own source URL, use this link to get started: https://github.com/EfazDev/efazdev-cdn/tree/main/cdn/extensions/remove-builder-font/resources/)

Source code of this project is available at GitHub: https://github.com/EfazDev/efazdev-cdn/tree/main/cdn/extensions/remove-builder-font/chromeExtension

Extension is made by @EfazDev. [Roblox did not make this extension.]
